    3600n,                      // proposalDuration (seg)ethers.parseEther("10")     // tokensPerVotePower)    60n,                        // minStakeLockTime (seg)    ethers.parseEther("100"),   // minStakeForProposing    ethers.parseEther("100"),   // minStakeForVoting    ethers.parseEther("0.001"), // tokenPriceWei    await token.getAddress(),    owner.address,const dao = await GovernanceDAO.deploy(
